description:
The intersphinx module requires internet access, and periodically causes docs jobs to fail.

This module also prevents docs from being built without internet access.

Since we don't actually use intersphinx for much (if anything), lets just remove it.
title: intersphinx requires network access  which sometimes fails

comments.content:
The intersphinx module requires internet access, and periodically causes docs jobs to fail.

This module also prevents docs from being built without internet access.

Since we don't actually use intersphinx for much (if anything), lets just remove it.
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~jogo

comments.content: message:"WARNING: intersphinx inventory" AND tags:"console.html" AND build_name:"gate-nova-docs"
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~jogo

comments.content:
Reviewed:  https://review.openstack.org/121200
Committed: https://git.openstack.org/cgit/openstack/nova/commit/?id=f5c3f6a95374244ae0d9a4d9a5e4a4ad9fe4608a
Submitter: Jenkins
Branch:    master

commit f5c3f6a95374244ae0d9a4d9a5e4a4ad9fe4608a
Author: Andreas Jaeger <email address hidden>
Date:   Fri Sep 12 22:41:42 2014 +0200

    Stop using intersphinx
    
    Remove intersphinx from the docs build as it triggers network calls that
    occasionally fail, and we don't really use intersphinx (links other
    sphinx documents out on the internet)
    
    This also removes the requirement for internet access during docs build.
    
    This causes docs jobs to fail because we error out on warnings.
    
    Change-Id: I71e941e2a639641a662a163c682eb86d51de42fb
    Related-Bug: #1368910
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~hudson-openstack

comments.content:
Related fix proposed to branch: master
